PBLSound Apps

Grand Piano auv3

Grand Piano auv3

Grand Piano auv3 brings you the sound of the classic instrument to your iPad and iPhone.

It can be used as standalone app or as AUv3 inside DAWs apps like GarageBand or Beatmaker3.

-Full key multi sampled.

-High quality samples.

-Polyphonic.

-Crystal clear sound.

-Low CPU load.

-Bluetooth LE MIDI.

If you need more controls like ADSR, filter, effects and presets module you can take a look at my other app Grand Piano AUv3 2.

App Privacy Policy Support
